dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Unscheduled flight delays at Almaty International Airport today, all because of a teenager's so-called joke.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Unscheduled flight delays at Almaty International Airport today, all because of a teenager's so-called joke.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A teenager's inappropriate joke at Almaty Airport led to flight delays and temporary flight restrictions, according to the press service of the Almaty City Counterterrorism Operations Headquarters (ACOH).

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A kid apparently joked that his friend had an explosive device in his backpack.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A kid apparently joked that his friend had an explosive device in his backpack.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "An incident occurred at Almaty International Airport: one of the teenagers jokingly claimed that his friend had an explosive device in his backpack.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: You're kidding me. At an airport? That's like, the one place you don't say stuff like that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You're kidding me. At an airport? That's like, the one place you don't say stuff like that.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And it triggered a full security protocol—they had to inspect the whole aircraft and all the passengers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And it triggered a full security protocol-they had to inspect the whole aircraft and all the passengers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a result, a protocol was activated to inspect the aircraft and all passengers, which caused a flight delay and temporary flight restrictions," the headquarters reported.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So that's why there were temporary flight restrictions. I mean, that's a huge disruption.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So that's why there were temporary flight restrictions. I mean, that's a huge disruption.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a result, a protocol was activated to inspect the aircraft and all passengers, which caused a flight delay and temporary flight restrictions," the headquarters reported.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And according to the Almaty Counterterrorism Operations Headquarters, they treat those statements as real threats, even if they're just jokes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And according to the Almaty Counterterrorism Operations Headquarters, they treat those statements as real threats, even if they're just jokes.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the ACOH, such statements " even made as a joke " are treated as potential security threats and trigger appropriate checks.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: As they should! It's not funny at all. People could miss connections, flights get backed up…
dialogue_turns.tts_text: As they should! It's not funny at all. People could miss connections, flights get backed up...

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Plus, the kid could actually face legal consequences under Kazakh law.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Plus, the kid could actually face legal consequences under Kazakh law.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In some cases, individuals may be held accountable in accordance with the laws of the Republic of Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I hope it's a lesson for everyone, honestly. Airports are high-security zones for a reason.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I hope it's a lesson for everyone, honestly. Airports are high-security zones for a reason.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and they're urging people to just… not even go there with that kind of language.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and they're urging people to just... not even go there with that kind of language.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "We urge citizens to act responsibly and refrain from using language or expressions related to threats, weapons, explosive devices, and other potentially dangerous topics in security areas and on board aircraft.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Common sense, right? But I guess some folks just don't think.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Common sense, right? But I guess some folks just don't think.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Or they think it's harmless, but it's really not. It wastes resources and puts everyone on edge.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Or they think it's harmless, but it's really not. It wastes resources and puts everyone on edge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Hopefully that message gets through after an incident like this.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. Hopefully that message gets through after an incident like this.
